name: Scratch's Schoolhouse: Widescreen Edition
description:
Note: This is the Widescreen version of Scratch's Schoolhouse, the original game can be played here: Scratch's Schoolhouse on Scratch (mit.edu) 
Also, this game isn't finished but it is released. I decided I would just finish this game in an update.


Story: Your friend, Michael, invited you to his school that he thinks is quote on quote "fun". You have no idea what the school has to offer, so you just decided you would give it a try.

Controls (ingame):
Use the left and right arrow keys to turn.
Press Up and Down (Or W and S) to move forward or backwards.
Press A or D to strafe left or right.
Press X to toggle the options.
Press M to toggle the map.

Controls (Solve-o-Matic):
Type the correct answer and hit enter.
If your score is below 0, its game over.
